column4: Hello #ubuntu, i have one question: when I install a new app, how it is decided if this app will or will not get a menu entry?
Some applications are GUI. Some appliations ar for terminal.
i know that, but also terminal applications sometimes get a menu entry.
Yes. And some packages are just back-ends for certain apps, such as plugins. No need for menu. If you know what you're installing, then you're likely to know where it can be found in.
